author: USA TODAY, Joel Shannon, USA TODAY
title: Coronavirus live updates: Authorities fight against Easter gatherings, White House task force to focus on 'opening' country
description: In an effort to keep coronavirus from spreading further, some local authorities are taking extra measures to prevent large Easter celebrations.
content:
There is a lot of misinformation out there about coronavirus. We sort the facts from falsehoods.
Wochit
